channel.title: Website on Vincent Behar
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Vincent Behar

item.title: Paris DevOps
item.description:
In 2011, soon after the creation of the Paris DevOps Meetup group, I joined the team and help organize the meetups.

I built the parisdevops.fr using Jekyll on GitHub Pages: https://github.com/parisdevops/parisdevops.github.com

I wrote content on the website and organized meetups for a few months in 2011.
